order_account = #{orderAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

order_identification = #{orderIdentification,jdbcType=INTEGER},

wide_edge = #{wideEdge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select:
select
from place
where custom_name = #{customName}
GROUP BY custom_name

select
from place where fake=0 and order_identification<number_of_spare_parts order by id desc

select
from place
order_account like "%"#{q}"%"

select
from place
and id
and order_account
and custom_name
and carton_name
and custom_tel
and staff_id
and order_num
and order_time
and delivery_time
and material_science
and pit_type
and carton_length
and carton_width
and carton_height
and length_line
and width_line
and line_type
like "%"#{item.value}"%"
=#{item.value}
<>#{item.value}
>#{item.value}
>=#{item.value}
<#{item.value}
<=#{item.value}
like #{item.value}"%"
like "%"#{item.value}
and order_time>=#{startTime}
and order_time<=#{endTime}
and fake=0
order by
id desc
id
order_account
custom_name
carton_name
custom_tel
staff_id
order_num
order_time
delivery_time
material_science
pit_type
carton_length
carton_width
carton_height
length_line
width_line
line_type
asc
desc
limit #{cur},#{rows}

select
from place
and id
and order_account
and custom_name
and carton_name
and custom_tel
and staff_id
and order_num
and order_time
and delivery_time
and material_science
and pit_type
and carton_length
and carton_width
and carton_height
and length_line
and width_line
and line_type
like "%"#{item.value}"%"
=#{item.value}
<>#{item.value}
>#{item.value}
>=#{item.value}
<#{item.value}
<=#{item.value}
like #{item.value}"%"
like "%"#{item.value}
and order_time>=#{startTime}
and order_time<=#{endTime}
and fake=0

select order_account as orderAccount,staff_id as staffId,custom_name as customName, carton_name as cartonName,carton_length as cartonLength,carton_width as cartonWidth,carton_height as cartonHeight, order_num as orderNum,material_science as materialScience,pit_type as pitType,blanking_length as blankingLength, blanking_width as blankingWidth,length_line as lengthLine,width_line as widthLine,number_of_spare_parts as numberOfSpareParts, working_procedure as workingProcedure,delivery_time as deliveryTime,(select stock_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount) as stockNum, (select out_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount) as outNum,(select n from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount) as n, IF((select stock_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount)>((select out_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount)+(select n from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount)),"","待纸板") as state from place where fake=0 and order_identification<=number_of_spare_parts ORDER BY state asc limit #{cur},#{rows}

select
from place where fake>1 or fake=0 and order_identification<=number_of_spare_parts and order_state=1 ORDER BY fake desc limit #{cur},#{rows}

select id, order_account as orderAccount,staff_id as staffId,custom_name as customName, carton_name as cartonName,carton_length as cartonLength,carton_width as cartonWidth,carton_height as cartonHeight, order_num as orderNum,material_science as materialScience,pit_type as pitType,blanking_length as blankingLength, blanking_width as blankingWidth,length_line as lengthLine,width_line as widthLine,number_of_spare_parts as numberOfSpareParts, working_procedure as workingProcedure,delivery_time as deliveryTime,(select stock_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount) as stockNum, (select out_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount) as outNum,(select n from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount) as n, IF((select stock_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount)>((select out_num from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount)+(select n from purchase_stock where order_account=orderAccount)),"","待纸板") as state from place where fake=0 or fake>1 and order_identification<=number_of_spare_parts and order_state=1 ORDER BY fake desc

select
from place where fake>1 or fake=0 and order_identification<=number_of_spare_parts and order_state=1 ORDER BY fake desc

select
from place where custom_name=#{customN} and fake=0
select order_account from place where fake=0 and id=(select max(id) from place where fake=0 and order_account like #{time}"%")
select order_account from place where pit_id=#{i}
